item.title: Introducing the Tattoos Project
item.description: The project Data extraction and classification Data analysis and visualisation The datasets The descriptions Criminal registers Founders and Survivors Registers of Habitual Criminals Code and data Whatâ€™s next? The project This website accompanies the British Academy funded project Criminal Tattoos. The remarkable increase in tattooing among convicts in the nineteenth century is poorly understood. It is unclear why convicts marked their bodies in ways which facilitated official surveillance, nor do we understand the complex mixture of sentiments expressed.
